                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"IPADPRO11_WI_2025\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"IPADPRO11_WI_2025\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"IPADPRO11_WI_2025\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"IPADPRO11_WI_2025\" collapse=\"true\"%}) Check Edit.",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

              "pricing": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/ipad-family/product-tile-section/ipad/pricing",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",
                "metadata": [
                  "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb"
                ],
                "_hidden": false,
                "_id": "a224c51d379a15a13444d7feff1fa7856a2c2a38a2b4bd3ca3d66174d8d8a33a",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"IPAD2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"IPAD2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"IPAD2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"IPAD2025_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },

                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/legal-urls/apple-card-customer-agreement",

                    "_id": "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117",
                    "copy": "https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf"
                  }
                ]
              },

              "pricing": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/ipad-family/product-tile-section/ipad-mini/pricing",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",
                "metadata": [
                  "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb"
                ],
                "_id": "56ec98896a8bad672093761b6670662d41c239a239ec23a67a1c5f6fe7b91596",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"IPADMINI2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"IPADMINI2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"IPADMINI2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"IPADMINI2024_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/legal-urls/apple-card-customer-agreement",

                    "copy": "https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf"
                  }
                ]
              },

                "copy": "Pay over time, interest{%nbhyp%}free. Test Check iof correct Check check check check",
                "_meta": []
              },
              "bodyCopy": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/ipad-family/icon-card-section/financing/body-copy",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",

                "_id": "43de7d3d6c2451214450afd9d3b2384aec94b70965d1fd57e578028ed0d93079",
                "copy": "When you choose to check out at Apple with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments.{%sosumi type=\"external\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-detailed",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "94c08ee30d2b3082401ae88a80e03f1f01bfd56a76c19b831ca2812f1841171d",
                      "96b62229a1705cf0f376e1aea533fb89c4d086cb6bd7cc24e884fcb01d3ce79e",
                      "c4f1688ac418d6f55590586382769e485f85b02d2570ee0d4bf4125ca17fc4a6",
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117",
                      "1670df75c08ffa0d3e06a9c23af5b58518184a2a7fc8c3b2654e41474c474ff5"
                    ],
                    "_id": "250ac3177dc2f5f9d11db761e1ac01b7c5af10456fe310e1a66092265cc47f61",
                    "copy": "Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata=\"2\" destination-type=\"external\"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[here]({%url metadata=\"3\" destination-type=\"appleExternal\"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value=\"effectiveDate\"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value=\"rates\"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIeligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers (prepaid carrier plans are not supported): AT&T, Boost Mobile, TMobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carriers terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made at the following special storefronts or when using these discounts in-store at Apple: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"4\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}All communications from Apple and Goldman Sachs Bank USA about Apple{%nbsp%}Card (including transactional and marketing communications) and customer service support are available in English. Certain communications about Apple{%nbsp%}Card can be viewed in another language depending on your device language settings. If you reside in the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, or U.S. Minor Outlying Islands, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata=\"5\" destination-type=\"external\"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}"
                  },

                    ],
                    "metadata": [],
                    "_id": "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4",
                    "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."
                  }
                ]
              },

                      "_id": "94856f884a09efa1275c8c7538fd9bcd8c9b776c102655ee818eb2da439d3644",
                      "copy": "Just add a trade{%nbhyp%}in when you choose a new product. Once your eligible device has been received and verified, well credit the value to your payment method. Or choose to check out with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments and well apply the credit instantly. Terms apply.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",

                          "_id": "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4",
                          "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."

                          "copy": "The latest iPad{%nbsp%}Pro, iPad{%nbsp%}Air, and iPad{%nbsp%}mini models are built for Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence, which helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%} With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data  not even{%nbsp%}Apple.",

                              "copy": "Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is available in beta. Some features may not be available in all regions or languages.                           "copy": "Communicate across languages.",
                          "_meta": []
                        },
                        "copy": {
                          "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/ipad-family/feature-card-section/apple-intelligence/modal/content2",

                          "metadata": [
                            "ff7cc94f326ba1390dab499a5a1432894d494d7506176823c07ce4f4030c9494",
                            "6711a8877d9cbbef37149edabdd0c70e6caf235697167a4728b50552f0fe26f0"
                          ],
                          "_id": "587828bc32e7d3603ca4ca288beafb282ddc3dca7668e7faa470b1b1621a7a51",
                          "copy": "Turn on Live{%nbsp%}Translation to automatically translate texts in Messages,{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%} display live translated captions in FaceTime, and get spoken translations for calls in the Phone{%nbsp%}app.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"2\"%}",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/apple-intelligence/live-translation",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "ff7cc94f326ba1390dab499a5a1432894d494d7506176823c07ce4f4030c9494",
                              "copy": "Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Messages is available in Chinese (Simplified), English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Series{%nbsp%}9 and later, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Ultra{%nbsp%}2 and later and Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}SE{%nbsp%}3 when paired with an Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence-enabled iPhone."
                            },
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/apple-intelligence/live-translation-phone",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "6711a8877d9cbbef37149edabdd0c70e6caf235697167a4728b50552f0fe26f0",
                              "copy": "Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Phone and FaceTime is available for one-on-one calls in English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac."
                            }
                          ]
                        },

                "copy": "iPad and Mac are designed to work together to form the ultimate creative setup. Sketch on your iPad and have it appear instantly on your Mac with Sidecar.                 "copy": "iPad is a great way to optimize your workouts while tracking your progress on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch. See personal metrics from Apple{%nbsp%}Watch integrated on the screen of your iPad in real time.           "content": {
            "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/composition/ipad-family-items/ribbon-section-items/holiday-idl",
            "_model": "ribbon",
            "_modelname": "RibbonModel",
            "title": "Holiday FY26 IDL",
            "copy": {
              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/ipad/content/ipad-family/ribbon-section/holiday-idl/copy",
              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
              "textType": "markdown",
              "metadata": [
                "46137aceef9afeff6b9712d4685f95fdd6d7a4e86a6718188c954f587bdda1a2"
              ],
              "_id": "80751fe01bc3cba232214a15cb1328dc61cf171a2d4d575c6a3d05159bb26b40",
              "copy": "Get gifts in time for the holidays with free two-hour delivery on eligible products  now through{%nbsp%}12/24.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
              "_meta": [
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/delivery/delivery-offer",
                  "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                  "textType": "markdown",
                  "categories": [
                    "legal"
                  ],
                  "metadata": [
                    "799b0805c5840fc4044d47c840993884d7864d192ee389f3d2692ee6f5682847"
                  ],
                  "_id": "46137aceef9afeff6b9712d4685f95fdd6d7a4e86a6718188c954f587bdda1a2",
                  "copy": "$0 two-hour delivery on purchases made from December 22, 2025, through December 24, 2025, on eligible Apple products in most metros. Offer applies to in{%nbhyp%}stock purchase(s) of iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch, AirPods, Apple{%nbsp%}TV, and Beats only. Offer is not available on customized Mac, engraved products, and for certain order types including orders paid for with financing or by bank transfer. Delivery times vary according to your selected delivery address, availability of your items, and the time of day you place your order. :[Find a store]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}) to view local store hours or see checkout for estimated delivery. A signature is required for delivery."
                },
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/legal-urls/retail",

                  "copy": "/retail"
                }
              ]

children.value: Buy iPad with education savings.{%sosumi type="promoted" metadata="1"%}. Ribbon Test

children.label: copy
children.value: Education pricing is available to current and newly accepted college students and their parents, as well as faculty, staff, and homeschool teachers of all grade levels. For more information, visit :[apple.com/us-edu/store]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

children.label: copy
children.value: UPDATES iPad Value test check updates

children.label: copy

children.label: copy
children.value: The ultimate iPad experience with the most advanced technology.Check for edits.

children.label: copy
children.value: {%pricing id="IPADPRO11_WI_2025" template="price.display.from"%} :[ or {%pricing id="IPADPRO11_WI_2025" template="price.display.perMonth"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id="IPADPRO11_WI_2025" template="price.display.months"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type="promoted" metadata="1"%}]({%pricing-fallback id="IPADPRO11_WI_2025" collapse="true"%}) Check Edit.

children.label: copy
children.value: Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.

children.label: copy
children.value: Available in Space Black, and Silver

children.value: Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata="2" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[here]({%url metadata="3" destination-type="appleExternal"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value="effectiveDate"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value="rates"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIeligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers (prepaid carrier plans are not supported): AT&T, Boost Mobile, TMobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carriers terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made at the following special storefronts or when using these discounts in-store at Apple: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="4" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}All communications from Apple and Goldman Sachs Bank USA about Apple{%nbsp%}Card (including transactional and marketing communications) and customer service support are available in English. Certain communications about Apple{%nbsp%}Card can be viewed in another language depending on your device language settings. If you reside in the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, or U.S. Minor Outlying Islands, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata="5" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}
